text: "Disconnected" is a song by the American heavy metal band Queensrÿche and is the last single released in support of their 1994 album Promised Land. == Formats and track listing == ;US 7" single (S7-18553) #"Disconnected" (Rockenfield, Tate) – 4:48 #"Bridge" (DeGarmo) – 2:42 ;US CD single (DPRO-19987) #"Disconnected" (radio edit) (Rockenfield, Tate) – 3:44 #"Disconnected" (fade-in version) (Rockenfield, Tate) – 3:57 #"Disconnected" (album version) (Rockenfield, Tate) – 4:38 #"Silent Lucidity" (live acoustic version) (DeGarmo) – 6:04 #"Dirty Little Secret" (DeGarmo, Tate) – 4:07 #"Someone Else?" (with full band) (DeGarmo, Tate) – 7:02 == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (1995) !Peak position |- | U.S. Billboard Mainstream Rock | style="text-align:center;"|32 |- |} == References == Category:1994 songs Category:1994 singles Category:Queensrÿche songs Category:EMI Records singles Category:Songs written by Scott Rockenfield Category:Songs written by Geoff Tate
title: Disconnected (Queensrÿche song)
